name: limitssson

body.origin:
|- wss(climits, con0)
-| wceq(climits, cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)))
-| wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), con0)
body.pretty:
⊢ Limits ⊆ On
⊣ Limits =((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })
⊣ ((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })⊆ On

-| wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), con0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Limits ⊆ On
⊣ Limits =((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })
⊣ ((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })⊆ On

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(climits, con0)
-| wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), con0)

stmt.origin: sstri(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), con0, cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), con0)
-| wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)))
-| wss(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), con0)
body.pretty:
⊢ ((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })⊆ On
⊣ ((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })⊆(On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))
⊣ (On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))⊆ On

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(climits, con0)
-| wss(cdif(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), csn(emptycls)), cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)))
-| wss(cin(con0, cfix(cbigcup)), con0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Limits ⊆ On
⊣ ((On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))\ { ∅ })⊆(On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))
⊣ (On ⋂ Fix(Bigcup))⊆ On

comment: The class of all limit ordinals is a subclass of the class of all ordinals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2012.)
